text:
SEEKING FREELANCERS ONSITE - London, UK

Energized Work has a number of upcoming client requirements for which we require the following contract roles:

- Graphic Designer (with UX understanding) - Front End Developers - Full Stack Developers - Product Managers - Scrum Masters - Technical Client Services Leader - Testers - UX Researcher - Systems architect

Interested in joining us or know someone who is? For more information, or to apply, please visit: https://www.energizedwork.com/careers
